name: Dominator_Control.Earth_Control
display_help: You can control the forces of the Earth. You can manipulate earth and stone to defeat your foes. The crushing force of many Earth Powers can reduce a target's Defense. Being of the Earth, many of these powers need to be performed while on the ground.

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Earth_Control.Stone_Prison
powers.display_help: Immobilizes a single target within an earthy formation and deals some Smashing damage over time. Some more resilient foes may require multiple attacks to Immobilize. Stone Prison can also reduce a target's Defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast

display_info: 5 ticks of 10.57 smashing damage over 9.2s on target
5 ticks of 28.27 smashing damage over 9.2s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 15s on target
-15.00% strength to defense for 15s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Earth_Control.Fossilize
powers.display_help: Encases a single target within solid stone. The stone slowly crushes the victim, dealing Smashing damage. The Fossilized victim is held helpless and unable to defend himself. Damage, Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -15.00% strength to defense for 12s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 12s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Earth_Control.Stone_Cages
powers.display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes within earthy formations and deals some Smashing damage over time. Slower and less damaging than Stone Prison, but can capture multiple targets. Stone Cages can also reduce a target's Defense. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged AoE, Minor DMG(Smash), Foe Immobilize, -Fly, -DEF

display_info: 3 ticks of 5.28 smashing damage over 5.2s on target
3 ticks of 6.83 smashing damage over 5.2s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 12s on target
-15.00% strength to defense for 12s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Earth_Control.Quicksand
powers.display_help: You can cause the ground to liquefy like Quicksand at a targeted location. Any foes that pass through the Quicksand will become snared, their movement will be dramatically Slowed, and their Defense reduced. Foes trapped in the Quicksand cannot jump or Fly. Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Earth_Control.Salt_Crystals
powers.display_help: Attempts to encrust all nearby foes in a Pillar of Salt. The victims will remain encased within the salt for quite a while, but will automatically break free if attacked. Affected targets have reduced defense for a while, even if they break free. Recharge: Long

display_info: -15.00% strength to defense for 15s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Earth_Control.Stalagmites
powers.display_help: You can cause Stalagmites to erupt all around an enemy, damaging all nearby foes. The Stalagmites deal minimal Lethal damage, and can Disorient all affected targets for a good while, as well as reduce their Defense. You must be on the ground to activate this power. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG(Lethal), Foe Disorient, -DEF

display_info: -15.00% strength to defense for 12s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Earth_Control.Earthquake
powers.display_help: Generates a powerful, localized Earthquake. Most foes that pass through the location will fall down. The violent shaking also reduces their chance to hit and Defense. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Earth_Control.Volcanic_Gasses
powers.display_help: You can tap into the geothermal power of the Earth and focus it at a targeted location. Foes that pass near a thermal vent will take minor Fire damage and be overcome by the gasses, leaving them choking and helpless. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Foe Hold, Minor DoT(Fire), Special

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Earth_Control.Animate_Stone
powers.display_help: Earth and stone coalesce to form an incredibly tough entity that can attack your foes. The Animated Stone is not alive and is immune to Psionic damage. It is also virtually immune to Sleep, Immobilize, Disorient, and Hold effects. The entity can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Type ''/release_pets'' in the chat window to release all your pets. Recharge: Long
